type.name: org.gradle.jvm.application.scripts.ScriptGenerator
type.description: Generates a script to start a JVM application. (see TemplateBasedScriptGenerator)

method.name: generateScript
method.description:
Generate the script.

Implementations should not close the given writer. It is the responsibility of the caller to close the stream.
param:details the application details
param:destination the script destination
